title: Black Guard

properties.name: description
properties.value: Black Guards are members of the Dwarven Black Guard found throughout areas controlled by the Dwarven Realm. They give Slayer experience if players are assigned to kill dwarves. They wield black warhammers, however the black guard in Keldagrim attack with them much faster than a normal warhammer.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Black Guard
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Black Guards are members of the Dwarven Black Guard found throughout areas controlled by the Dwarven Realm. They give Slayer experience if players are assigned to kill dwarves. They wield black warhammers, however the black guard in Keldagrim attack with them much faster than a normal warhammer.

Note: The Black Guards located near Ice Mountain have a limited chance of dropping dwarven loot. Refer to dwarf drop information if this is of interest to you.

  1. ^ The "nothing" drop is removed while wearing a ring of wealth.
  2. ^ 2.00 2.01 2.02 2.03 2.04 2.05 2.06 2.07 2.08 2.09 2.10 2.11 The drop rate is increased while wearing a ring of wealth due to the "nothing" drop being removed.
  3. ^ 3.0 3.1 The talisman dropped depends on where the monster is located: monsters above ground level drop the nature talisman, and monsters below ground level drop the chaos talisman.
  4. ^ 4.0 4.1 4.2 Only dropped if Legends' Quest has been finished; if not, a talisman is dropped instead.
